text: Lama Alshamandi () is a Syrian actress and voice actress. == Filmography == === Television === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Year !Title !Role ! class = "unsortable" | Notes ! class = "unsortable" | Sources |- |2006 |Khalid ibn al- Walid | | | |} === Dubbing roles === *Acı Hayat *Assassin's Creed Syndicate – Evie Frye (credited as Lama Chamandi) *Bakugan Battle Brawlers – Wafek (Dan Kuso) *Bakugan Battle Brawlers: New Vestroia – Wafek (Dan Kuso) *Bakugan: Gundalian Invaders – Wafek (Dan Kuso) *Battle B-Daman – Mie Daiwa, Enjyu (Cain McDonnell) *Battle B-Daman: Fire Spirits! – Mie Daiwa *Bazar *Clamp School Detectives - Akira Ijyuin *Crash B-Daman – Kaito Namihira, Hanbei Takeichi *Deli Yürek *Detective Conan – Ai Haibara/Shiho Miyano (second voice), Eri Kisaki (Part 8), Vermouth (Part 5), Kazuha Toyama *Detective Conan: The Fourteenth Target – Eri Kisaki *Detective Conan: Captured in Her Eyes – Ai Haibara/Shiho Miyano, Eri Kisaki *Dudaktan Kalbe *Fifi and the Flowertots – Fifi (first voice) *Flikken Maastricht *Golden Warrior Gold Lightan – Emi Takakura *Hamtaro - Dexter (Part 6), Panda (Part 6), Stan (Part 6) *Idaten Jump - Ayumu Yamato *Inazuma Eleven – Yuuki Tachimukai (first voice), Rika Urabe (first voice) *Inuyasha - Kagome Higurashi *Kung Fu Kid *Mujeres asesinas *Naruto – Shizune (1st voice), Nawaki *Net Ghost PiPoPa – Yūta Akikawa *One Piece – Tony Tony Chopper, Kaya, Tashigi (second voice), Paula *Prison Break – Sara Tancredi *Ranma ½ – Kasumi Tendo *Scan2Go – Futaba Morishima *SoltyRei – Accela Warrick *Sortilegio *Strawberry Shortcake – Strawberry Shortcake (second voice), Orange Blossom (first voice), Honey Pie Pony *Strawberry Shortcake: The Sweet Dreams Movie – Strawberry Shortcake *Teresa *Thaman Omri *The Sword and the Chess of Death *Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai *Yanık Koza == External links == * (credited as Lama Al-Chamandi) *Lama Alshamandi at ElCinema (credited as Lama Al-Chamandi) Category:21st- century Syrian actresses Category:Lebanese voice actresses Category:Syrian voice actresses Category:People from Damascus Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
